title: Great 5 Bed steps to Brighton Cntr & Oak Sq. Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 157386188', 'Rent: $3,200 / Month', 'Beds: 5', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 09/01/2019', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Fantastic updated apartment just steps to Brighton Center and Oak Square.', 'Property features include 5 beds with 1.5 baths, hardwood floors throughout, living room, updated eat in kitchen with dishwasher, ceiling fans, common yard, onsite laundry and more.', " Located just a short distance from New Balance's Boston Landing, area shops, restaurants, Starbucks, YMCA and major routes such as the Mass Turnpike and Storrow Drive.", 'Walk to public transportation - Express Bus 501 & 503 to Downtown Boston & Copley Square.', 'This is a must see.', 'Available for occupancy: September 1, 2019', 'Pet Friendly with restrictions.', 'Contact Matt 781-316-4295 for details and to set up a showing.', 'Fantastic updated apartment just steps to Brighton Center and Oak Square on a highly desired street.', 'Property features include 6 total rooms with 3 beds, hardwood floors throughout, living room, dining room, eat in kitchen with dishwasher and disposal, front and rear porches, off street parking and more.', 'This is a must see.', 'Available for occupancy: September 1', 'Pet Friendly with restrictions.', 'Terms:', 'Available 9/1/2022', '12 Month Lease', 'First & Security', 'Pets: Pet Friendly / Subject to Landlord Approval', 'Broker Fee: By Tenant', 'Call Matt Moran 781-316-4295 for details and to set up a showing.', 'Broker Fees May apply', 'CALL/TEXT  MATT 781-316-4295', 'Rock Hill Residential Group', '300 Market Street', 'Brighton, MA 02135', 'c: 781.316.4295', 'website: <URL>', 'Listing Agent / Landlord make no representation or warranty as to the accuracy or completeness of the information provided herein.', 'Any prospective tenant will rely on their own independent evaluation pertaining to the information provided.', 'Prospective tenants should make their own projections, assumptions and conclusions regarding the subject properties.']
